author: asavu
msg: Make sure we also sign all the build-tools artifacts

author: bimargulies
msg: MNG-3498: StringIndexOutOfBounds -1 during path translation while reading pom.xml
o Fix test to use the plugin it builds, not go looking for some other mythical plugin.

author: bimargulies
msg: MNG-3710: ModelUtils.cloneModel() and .cloneBuild() pollute existing Plugin instances with merged information
o repair integration test to invoke the plugin under the actual artifactId that it was built under, and not another.

author: bimargulies
msg: MNG-3716: Aggregators that fork lifecycles don't have execution projects setup for all projects in the reactor.
o fix historical IT so that the test tries to execute the plugin that it builds, not one with a slightly different artifactId.

author: bimargulies
msg: MNG-3746: POM properties do not override default system properties during POM interpolation
o make this integration test work by rendering its two parts consistent.
